root.description: The room is cold and dark.

exit.description: The only source of light is star light twinkling in through the [gate].
exit.detailedDescription: The [gate] is the only path you can see.

prop.description: The [darkness] is so dense it is almost blinking.
prop.detailedDescription: The [darkness] is just waiting to be lit up.

prop.description: The sound of you breath echoes in your ears. The [walls] of this room must be close.
prop.detailedDescription: You cannot see anything, but reaching out your hand, you feel marks carved into one of the [walls].
